Package com.deco2800.game.components.tasks

Class AnchoredChaseTask

java.lang.Object
com.deco2800.game.ai.tasks.DefaultTask
com.deco2800.game.components.tasks.ChaseTask
com.deco2800.game.components.tasks.AnchoredChaseTask
All Implemented Interfaces:
PriorityTask, Task
public class AnchoredChaseTask
extends ChaseTask
implements PriorityTask
Chases a target entity until they get too far away, leaves the base anchor, or line of sight is lost

  • Constructor Details

    • AnchoredChaseTask

      public AnchoredChaseTask​(Entity target, float viewDistance, float maxChaseDistance, Entity anchor, float protectRadius)
      Parameters:
      target - The entity to chase.
      viewDistance - Maximum distance from the entity at which chasing can start.
      maxChaseDistance - Maximum distance from the entity while chasing before giving up.
      anchor - - entity to retreat to
      protectRadius - - bounds around the object to stay in

    • AnchoredChaseTask

      public AnchoredChaseTask​(Entity target, float viewDistance, float maxChaseDistance, Entity anchor, float protectX, float protectY)
      Parameters:
      target - The entity to chase.
      viewDistance - Maximum distance from the entity at which chasing can start.
      maxChaseDistance - Maximum distance from the entity while chasing before giving up.
      anchor - - entity to retreat to
      protectX - - bounds around the object to stay in on the x axis
      protectY - - bounds around the object to stay in on the y axis

  • Method Details

    • getPriority

      public int getPriority()
      Description copied from class: ChaseTask
      Return the priority of chase task when it active (run) or return the priority of chasetask when it inactive (other task run)
      Specified by:
      getPriority in interface PriorityTask
      Overrides:
      getPriority in class ChaseTask
      Returns:
      -1 to deactivate if the target is outside of the base or it passes the call to its super to calculate if the target is in range and visible
